title: LOL merch to Syd. Scammed or wait???
body:
I ordered some merch from the Riot games merch official site found through the game, and reluctantly paid the excessive international shipment fees. A couple of days later I got an email with a tracking number.  That was the 11.02. I just tried it and it says this tracking number can't be found. 
Should I just report as a scam and get a refund from paypal, or would there be a legit. reason for this? If i leave it too long even PayPal can't help me get my money back.
Please someone tell me what to do?

replies.body:
If you send a ticket to Player Support they should be able to see the status of your order: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Would also be worth checking your mailbox for a "your item has been delivered to the nearest post office" slip.

While there is a scenario where your package may have been lost, it certainly wouldn't be intentional. From personal experience, I know that the tracking sites are often buggy or down, and have never had an item not be delivered eventually from Riot, so I wouldn't be inclined to worry too much.
